text: Aur kafiro ney kaha kay hum hergiz na to iss quran ko manay na iss say pehlay ki kitabon ko! Aey dekhney walay kaash kay tu inn zalimon ko uss waqt dekhta jab kay yeh apnay rab kay samney kharay huyey aik doosray ko ilzam dey rahey hongay kamzor log baray logon say kahen gay agar tum na hotay to hum to momin hotay
